QuestData.Title: The Twilight Forge
QuestData.Description: <Pip's helm hums with energy.>$B$BDamn it! Raz won't stop! It's as if he were possessed with a burning vengeance for all things Twilight! It looks like if we're going to get past this room and catch up with Raz we'll need to take out the Twilight armorer, Karsh Steelbender. Kill him quick, $n.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I think he might be able to bend steel.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Raz is close. I can hear him!
QuestData.RewardText: <Finkle's helm crackles with static.>$B$BThat should put a stop to their armory - at least for now.$B$BRaz ran off across the ramp on the other side of the forge. GO GO GO!
